text.content:
Bad Fall

You fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Spraining Shot

Until healed, you take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: -10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed} and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}.

Ranged

Bad Jam

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}.

Unarmed

Exploding Skull

You must attempt a @Check[fortitude] save. If you succeed, you take @Damage[3d6[mental]] damage. If you fail, your head explodes and you die.

Spell
